sentences.en: Barriers between nations are reared by slow and infrequent communication.
sentences.cn: 国与国之间的隔阂是由沟通缓慢而又太少形成的.

sentences.en: Chances to see Ashley alone were all too infrequent these days.
sentences.cn: 最近,要想与艾希礼单独会面可不怎么容易呀.

sentences.en: Direct fetal injury is an infrequent complication of blunt trauma.
sentences.cn: 胎儿直接损伤是钝器伤的罕见并发症.

sentences.en: Disturbances are relatively infrequent in British prisons.
sentences.cn: 相对来说,英国监狱不常发生骚乱.

sentences.en: For example, references to smell or odour are infrequent.
sentences.cn: 例如, 对于嗅觉和气味就很少被提到.

sentences.en: It appears such incidents are not infrequent.
sentences.cn: 看来这样的事故并不少见.

sentences.en: Kinking endotracheal tube ( ETT ) is not an infrequent problem during general anesthesia.
sentences.cn: 在全身麻醉插管病患中,气管内管弯折其实是常见的问题.

sentences.en: Successes are infrequent, often outnumbered by failures.
sentences.cn: 成功很少, 失败甚多.

sentences.en: The disease is infrequent , and this makes it impossible to determine its true incidence.
sentences.cn: 本病较为罕见, 故无法确定其发病率.

sentences.en: Their marital storms are infrequent and quickly lost.
sentences.cn: 他们夫妻间的感情很少掀起狂风巨浪,有也迅即平息.

sentences.en: Therefore, the collective operation in experimental sciences is very infrequent in mathematics.
sentences.cn: 因此那种在实验性科学中实行的集体协作工作,在数学研究中相当罕见.

sentences.en: These infrequent users cannot be ignored.
sentences.cn: 这些偶尔使用者的人数很少,但也不能被忽略.

sentences.en: They would make infrequent visits to the house.
sentences.cn: 他们偶尔去看一看那所房子。

sentences.en: This represents an extremely infrequent scenario in embryology.
sentences.cn: 这种血管走向在胚胎发生学上是一种极不寻常的案例.
